::Skulletron::

	In the CR Chamber, Skulletron awoke.  He didn't have any idea of where he
was for a couple seconds, or who the heck he was or anything.  Then
instantly, something just clicked into his mind.  He remembered talking to
a bot named Soundwave.  He had to find the leader of the Alliance, Zardus. 
Skulletron saw his plasma rifle at his side.  He picked it up and
then--BANG!--He blasted his way out of the CR Chamber.

	"You, Bloodstryke I believe, where is Zardus!!!!!!  I must see him!!!  I
have to help the Alliance!  I have to aid them in winning their battles and
in reaching their goals.......For We Are Many!!!!"
